FuncDef: The reset cpu-defend auto-port-defend statistics command deletes packet statistics on port attack defense. The reset cpu-defend auto-port-defend statistics command deletes packet statistics on port attack defense.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.

ExtraInfo: Before viewing packet statistics of port attack defense in a certain period, delete existing packet statistics, and then run the display auto-port-defend statistics command to collect the latest statistics.
